mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsurr`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_user_role_relation as `tbsurr`
GROUP BY
`tbsurr`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserRoleRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsurr`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user_role_relation as `tbsurr`
GROUP BY
`tbsurr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserRoleRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsurr`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user_role_relation as `tbsurr`
GROUP BY
`tbsurr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserRoleRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsurr`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user_role_relation as `tbsurr`
GROUP BY
`tbsurr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserRoleRelationPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbsurr`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user_role_relation as `tbsurr`
GROUP BY
`tbsurr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserRoleRelationPo.havingClause}
